description: four drawers; cast brass oversize pulls and escutcheons; block ends extending down through bracket feet; key and clip tacked inside top drawer
dimension: a (chest): H.32-3/8 x W.37-1/8 x D.23-1/4 in. (overall); b,c (top drawers): H.4 x W.32-1/2 x D.29-7/8 in. (each); d,e (bottom drawers): H.6 in. (each)
title: Boston Chest of Drawers
